citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30am on
18-APR-17.
The inspector was able to make contact with the Licensee by phone. He was able to confirm that no one was
available for inspection at that time.
